title: Radisson Hotel Group to open its first hotel in West Bengal
description: Radisson Group of Hotels signed its first hotel in West Bengal, Radisson Hotel Siliguri. The hotel is set to open by Q2 2028.. The hotel aims to enhance connectivity to northeastern cities and neighboring countries. The property will offer 150 rooms, a fitness center, event spaces, dining options and a swimming pool.
